name: Day 7 - FPV Simulator
description:
This is an early development game created as a challenge to myself to build a better mobile fpv simulator.

If you have found a batch of settings you like, please take a screenshot of the settings window and send it to me or post in the discussion board.

Currently I would like to find good settings for a 3" freestyle, 5" freestyle, and 1s whoop. Thanks for your help!

Features:

  • Accurate physics
  • full pid and rate customization
  • randomly generated maps
  • Controller support
  • Freestyle friendly buildings and objects
  • Traffic and moving cars

More To Come!!
